description: ServiceSpec defines whether a TraefikService is a load-balancer of services or a mirroring service.

mirroring.description: Mirroring defines a mirroring service, which is composed of a main load-balancer, and a list of mirrors.

items.description: MirrorService defines one of the mirrors of a Mirroring service.

name.description: Name is a reference to a Kubernetes Service object (for a load-balancer of servers), or to a TraefikService object (service load-balancer, mirroring, etc). The differentiation between the two is specified in the Kind field.

responseForwarding.description: ResponseForwarding holds configuration for the forward of the response.

cookie.description: Cookie holds the sticky configuration based on cookie.

weight.description: Weight should only be specified when Name references a TraefikService object (and to be precise, one that embeds a Weighted Round Robin).

responseForwarding.description: ResponseForwarding holds configuration for the forward of the response.

cookie.description: Cookie holds the sticky configuration based on cookie.

weight.description: Weight should only be specified when Name references a TraefikService object (and to be precise, one that embeds a Weighted Round Robin).

weighted.description: WeightedRoundRobin defines a load-balancer of services.

items.description: Service defines an upstream to proxy traffic.

title: Traefik Service
